title: Slay Belle and Sandstorm Katarina are missing their unique E particles.

embed.description: Expected result**: Sandstorm has sand particles on her E on both her initial location and new location, Slay Belle has green and snowflakes on...

body:
This bug has been happening for quite a lot of patches now, and it gets very annoying for me. Slay Belle Katarina  is missing a majority of her green particles on E and a majority of her snowflakes. Sandstorm Katarina  is also missing her sand-coloured particle on her initial location before E, instead having the basic red smoke.

RIOT, I think we should get what we paid for in these skins, and after so many patches could we please see a particle fix.

You can check the Skin Spotlights for what the particles should look like:

[Sandstorm](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HiLZ_udJOjA&feature=youtu.be&t=43s) and [Slay Belle](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YU7UKEFl3g8&feature=youtu.be&t=44s),

Compared to what they currently look like:

[Sandstorm](https://i.imgur.com/JQzaGRt.png) and [Slay Belle](https://i.imgur.com/9mOGjxD.png).

Thank you for reading, I would love to see this fixed. :)

replies.body:
Hiya AND RUN OFF,

Thanks for the report! We'll take a look and see what happened to these particles.
